thread.title: Mesut Ozil is under fire to improve from Arsenal team-mates as squad factions think Arsene Wenger is too soft on him
thread.title_full: Mesut Ozil is under fire to improve from Arsenal team-mates as squad factions think Arsene Wenger is too soft on him

author: tgannon
title: Mesut Ozil is under fire to improve from Arsenal team-mates as squad factions think Arsene Wenger is too soft on him
text:
EFL Mesy situation Mesut Ozil is under fire to improve from Arsenal team-mates as squad factions think Arsene Wenger is too soft on him 
Germany playmaker has not scored in over two months but club pals reportedly believe he gets preferential treatment Gossip Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MESUT OZIL has come under fire as factions within the Arsenal dressing room feel Arsene Wenger is too soft on him, according to reports. 
Ozil has not scored since the Gunners’ 3-1 win over Stoke over two months ago. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Since then, Arsenal have lost four out of eight games. According to the Daily Mail , there are some within the dressing room that are disappointed in Ozil’s commitment. Getty Images Mesut Ozil has been told to up his game by Arsene Wenger after having a barren two-month spell Getty Images The Germany playmaker remains a regular starter in Arsene Wenger’s Arsenal side AP:Associated Press 7 Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil is determined to improve his form 
Gunners stars are said to be particularly riled by Ozil’s failure to challenge Ashley Williams at a defensive set-piece when Arsenal lost to Everton in December. 
The former Real Madrid star’s no-shows against Manchester City and Chelsea also caused his team-mates to grumble. 
It is believed Ozil has become more secluded from his colleagues, with the report claiming he even clicks his fingers to signal to pals it is time to make a quiet exit after games. Related Stories Ex-Arsenal star Lukas Podolski shocks takeaway customers by working in a KEBAB SHOP on Saturday Pretty vacant Arsenal 'deliberately misleading' fans with 'fake' attendances, blasts club's Supporters' Trust KO BLOW The Champions League is back and our experts make their picks... but it's not good news for the English contingent LOTHAR'S LOWDOWN Gabriel Jesus can be quick off the mark for Man City as they prepare for a Champions League assault IT's SUNREAL Sutton's Simon Downer ready to shoot down Arsenal in FA Cup as stocky stopper takes aim at team-mates 
Sources insist Arsenal’s record £42.5million signing is desperate to start firing again. 
But some team-mates are still said to believe different rules apply for the German with regards to squad rotation and substitutions. Reuters Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain is subbed off before Mesut Ozil when Arsenal are not winning Reuters Alex Iwobi also often finds his time is up while Arsenal are losing Reuters 7 Theo Walcott is another attacking midfielder who makes way before Mesut Ozil 
Stats show fellow attacking midfielders Alex Iwobi, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain and Theo Walcott are the players to make way when Arsenal are not winning. 
In these instances, Ozil has never been subbed. 
The German is likely to start against Bayern Munich in Wednesday’s Champions League crunch despite Wenger telling him to up his game. Arsenal star Mesut Ozil stars in the latest advert for Mercedes Benz cars
